inn1.comm: solid forward defence first up, a length ball heading for off
a hint of movement away from the right-hander this time, with the angle and that is left alone
another leave outside off
short of a length and closer to off this time, poked in front of point by Sibanda
keeps probing around the off stump, batsman is happy to shoulder arms to that one
on middle and off, Sibanda gets forward and blocks to the leg side to complete a maiden
big appeal for a caught behind down the leg side, seemed to have come off the thigh pad, umpire Ian Gould calls it a wide
just a bit of width, Chibhabha stands tall and punches it through cover for three, and Zimbabwe get their first runs off the bat, nice confident shot from Chibhabha to get going
on middle and leg stump, defended to the leg side by Sibanda
a hint of inward movement there, Sibanda is hurried into his defence, struck high on the thigh pad
pitched up and just outside off, left alone by Sibanda
big appeal for lbw, this pitched outside leg though, was going on to hit leg stump though
targetting the off stump this time, more defence from Sibanda to end the over
well outside off and that is left alone
on the pads this time, Chibhabha wants to work that to the leg side but can't get bat on it
very little movement on offer so far today, this one angles outside off and the batsman is content to shoulder arms
fires this in full, Chibhabha shuffles across and works it fine down the leg side for a couple
again bowling from wide of the crease, Chibhabha moves outside off as he pokes that one towards point, gets a big stride across the stumps
just outside off and Chibhabha gets behind the line and defends, a quiet start for Zimbabwe
Sibanda gets his first mark, a length ball heading for off stump, pushed towards midwicket and the batsmen scramble a single
a touch shorter this time, same line though and Chibhabha defends it to the off side
Junaid maintains that probing line, Chibhabha gets back and pushes it towards mid-off
Junaid slips in the bouncer, Chibhabha was initially moving forward, surprised by that one but goes for the pull anyway, off the glove and over the keeper's head for four
another loud appeal for lbw, again pitched just outside leg and hit high on the pad as well, the ball rolls towards point
just outside off, batsman shoulders arms
and there's the first breakthrough, a length ball around off stump, Chibhabha tries a lofted drive on the up, he can't get it past mid-off, who moves across to his left to take that one
left alone outside off by Masakadza
once more Masakadza happy to allow the ball through to the keeper
another leave outside off
that one seamed away a bit, Masakadza was fishing at that one, there's a mild appeal for caught behind after the batsman is beaten
length ball on middle and leg, defended towards cover off the front foot
Pakistan's fast bowlers have been very accurate this morning, again around off stump, defended to the off side
another Junaid appeal for lbw, once more it pitches outside leg

the pull shot causes Sibanda more trouble, doesn't cost him his wicket this time, as he tries to smash the ball to the leg side, he bottom-edges it on to his "abdominal protector" as Neil Manthorp calls it, he's in a bit of pain
Junaid continues to keep the batsman quiet
how many times have we seen this already? another lbw appeal, again outside leg, a long way outside leg
again Sibanda goes the pull, this time there's no bottom-edge even, struck on the pad by a ball going outside off
length ball on leg stump, defended back towards the bowler
length ball on middle and off, blocked down the track
length ball in the channel outside off, batsman leaves it through to the keeper
shorter this time and a bit wide, and the batsman is happy to shoulder arms
Masakadza falls over as he looks to drive the ball, it was a full ball and he was looking to drive, off the outside edge towards cover, loses his footing as he plays that
a more graceful shot from Sibanda, eases it past mid-off and picks up three
short of length ball outside off, the batsman is content to leave
on the pads this time, helped behind square leg by Sibanda
length ball just outside off, driven off the front foot towards short extra cover
back of a length ball is pushed back towards the bowler
blocked to the off side off the front foot
end of another tidy over from Junaid, driven towards mid-off
bit of movement away, and that is again let through to the keeper, an old-school start this from Zimbabwe
short of length ball on off stump, prodded off the front foot towards the off side
strays on to the leg side, off the pads and towards short fine leg
some bounce there for Tanvir, well outside off though and the batsman isn't tempted by that one
pitched up, driven firmly to mid-off, where a misfield by Misbah makes sure there is no drama as a quick single is pinched
short of length and angling away, another leave
on the pads, batsman looks to whip it towards midwicket, can't connect
short of length and just outside off, once again it is left alone
wider outside off, let through to the keeper once more
not much footwork there from Masakadza as he tries to crash a wide ball past point, no contact
on the pads this time, helped down to fine leg for a single
the tale of Sibanda and the misfiring pull continues, again he tries the shot, he misses and is struck on the body
pitched up and outside off, the batsman moves across a long way, jumps down the track as well, a thick outside edge to third man
length ball on off, goes for a booming shot towards midwicket, edged towards midwicket

someone tell Sibanda to not play the pull, he goes for a big swipe towards midwicket to a shortish ball, edges it, and it flies high towards mid-on, where Aizaz Cheema has to run back a bit to collect that, should have taken it, drops it, Tanvir as expected is not thrilled
down the leg side
some extra bounce there for Tanvir, Masakadza was on the front foot, and was surprised by the bounce, he's beaten as he looks to defend
Tanvir can't believe he hasn't got a wicket this over, the ball is already angling across the batsman, and it nips away a bit further, the batsman looks to drive but doesn't get anywhere close to it
closer to off this time, cautiously left alone to end the over
he starts with a wayward delivery down the leg side
outside off and once again the keeper collects
Cheema bowling from wide of the crease, angles it in towards the leg side, off the pads towards square leg
batsman moves well outside off, and tucks the ball to the leg side
beaten, this was in the channel outside off, batsman looks to defend off the front foot, just past the outside edge
short of length ball angling in, defended down the track

the Sibanda pull finally comes off, a short ball ball, and Sibanda swivels as he dispatches that towards deep backward square leg, there is a man in the deep but it clears him comfortably, this shot too seemed to have been a bit of a top edge, one four and one six in the innings so far
getting it to move across Masakadaza who looks to defend but sees the ball zip past to the keeper
big stride in as he blocks a length ball
very short ball on leg stump, Masakadaza moved across and went for the pull, off the back of the bat and towards the slips, cries of 'catch' but it lands well short
outside off and another leave
defended down the track this time
short of length ball on off stump, blocked towards cover, it has been a super spell from Tanvir today

at long last Sibanda perishes to the pull, it has been fascinating to watch how bull-headed he has been, surely someone has told him to shelve the shot for a while, anyway he goes for it when he sees the short ball, top edge and its a skier for the keeper, easy take for Adnan, Sibanda's troubled stay is over
short of length ball coming in, defended towards cover
looked to pull and missed it
short ball and outside off, and the batsman ducks under that

a mix-up, and that could have been curtains for Taylor, Masakadza pokes the ball towards point and sets off for a run, Taylor is a long way from completing the runs as Malik fields, he under-arms it towards the keeper's end, but misses, to Taylor's relief
outside off and left alone
short and wide outside off, smashed it straight towards cover
short of length ball outside off, pushed towards mid-off off the back foot
a bouncer on middle and leg, too short and that is over the batsman's head, that's a wide
a mistimed slap towards mid-off, a single is taken
blocked towards midwicket
short of length ball on off stump, defended behind point
length ball heading outside off, left alone
short of length ball on off stump, inside-edge and the ball drops dead at his feet
Shot! one of the most convincing ones of the innings, a full slower ball from Cheema, lashes it past mid-off for a boundary
short ball outside off, Masakadza attempts a strange shot, trying to work it to square leg, the ball dribbles towards short midwicket
full and well outside off, Taylor raises his bat over his head as he lets it through to the keeper
slants this in towards off stump, length ball and that is tapped towards midwicket
Cheema keeps it nice and tight, heading for off once more, Taylor blocks it
shortish ball is defended off the back foot, Masakadza drops it at his feet and sets off for a run, there wasn't one, Taylor wisely sends him back
this time there is a single, pushed towards mid-on and Masakadza calls as soon as he plays the shot
short of length ball outside off, another leave
just outside off, and that is defended towards point
angling across the batsman who is happy to let it through to the keeper
tapped in front of square leg,sets off for the run, the bowler has to race across to field, enough time for the batsman to reach safety
short of length ball coming in, batsman goes deep in the crease and defends it towards point
defended off the front foot towards cover
pitched up by Cheema, chipped wide of mid-on by Taylor, he's stuck on the crease as he plays that shot, not too convincing, gets a couple nonetheless
again non-existent footwork as he attempts a Hollywood swing, tries to carve the ball through the off side but is beaten
just a bit of width, played past point for another couple that brings up the Zimbabwe 50
short and wide, slapped with more power this time, towards deep backward point, that ends a decent over for Zimbabwe
starts with a gentle delivery well outside off, hint of away movement
shortish and outside off, slapped powerfully through cover, sweeper cover has to make a lot of ground to his right to field
driven towards short cover this time
some intent from Zimbabwe, Masakadaza comes down the track and whips the ball towards deep square leg
Zimbabwe capitalising on Younis' gentle offerings, a flat-batted swat sends a length ball towards the long-on boundary for four
overpitched and well outside off, driving past a diving short cover and towards long-off for a single
this one is heading for middle and leg, eased towards long-on, and the over throw allows an extra run
patted towards cover, Taylor wants one, but Masakadza doesn't, Taylor turns back
length ball on off stump, defended down the track
punched towards sweeper cover for a single
short of length ball and heading for off stump, defended back towards the bowler

ooh, close call for Masakadza, he was looking to whip that to the leg side, inside-edge on to the pad and the ball loops up and lands a few feet ahead of him, Cheema tries to get there but it lands well short of him
a wristy shot towards mid-on, a sharp single is pinched
length ball is driven past point
length ball is driven down to long-on for a single
short of length ball just outside off, defended back to the bowler
a top-edged sweep towards deep backward square leg for a single
tapped past mid-on for a single
jabbed towards point
an adventurous shot from Taylor, moves across the stumps and plays a paddle sweep
slapped towards sweeper cover for a single
stands tall and drives that towards short midwicket
just outside off and that is tucked towards square leg
inside-edge down towards fine leg to end the over, nothing dramatic in the pitch for either spinner so far
tucked towards midwicket and a quick single is taken
a very thin edge there, Taylor was looking to drive, off the outside edge, no slips in place, so there's a long chase for Ajmal, who does well to keep the ball from reaching the ropes
worked from around off towards square leg
the paddle-sweep makes another appearance, Taylor had played it down along the ground, Masakadza is happy to play it in the air, picks up a boundary
run-scoring has been easier against the spinners so far, pushed to long-on for a single
again long-on has to field as Zimbabwe complete another profitable over
Zimbabwe are switching gears here, a powerful slog-sweep from Taylor, gets on one knee and hammers that wide of deep midwicket for four
defended towards the bowler
blocked to the right of the bowler
this one goes straight on, Taylor gets behind the line and blocks
shuffles across and tucks it towards midwicket
a controlled sweep from Taylor to complete the over, down to deep backward square leg
on the pads, clipped towards square leg
blocked back towards the bowler
"Very well done, very well done," shouts Adnan after a regulation stop at short cover
punched down towards long-on for a single
clipped towards square leg for another single
lovely shot from Masakadza, overpitched by Ajmal and that is powered down the ground for four
looks to sweep this one but can't get it past short fine
this time he sweeps it to deep backward square leg for a single
looks to defend to the off side, off the front pad and lobs to the keeper's left
wanted to drive that to the leg side, was beaten as that goes straight on outside off
pushed towards point off the back foot for a single
wants to defend this to the off side, gets a leading edge towards square leg
on the pads, nudged towards square leg for a single
length ball on the pads, another nurdle towards square leg
stands tall and drives that towards midwicket
short and on leg stump, another single, in front of square leg
an ambled single, eased towards long-on, runs coming easily for Zimbabwe
patted back towards the bowler
first ball of the over is pushed to midwicket
towards the same fielder this time, but he can't stop it even with a dive, so long-on has to field that
attempts the reverse-sweep, can't connect very well, the ball dribbles towards slip
full and quick, Masakadza was late on the shot and he is struck on the boot, lbw appeal but that was going down
slower delivery, flighted, off the pads for a single
poked in front of point, batsmen zip through for a single
comes down the track and blocks a short of length ball
keeps it short, eased towards long-on, the singles continue to flow for Zimbabwe
worked to midwicket, but can't find the gao
Hafeez has been targetting leg stump in this spell, again Masakadza can't beat midwicket
worked towards deep square leg for a single this time
punched down to long-on for a risk-free single
an lbw appeal, muted one as that was outside off, off the pad and towards point where a struggling Junaid fields
worked behind square leg for one
tossed up, length ball on legstump, worked past midwicket
Taylor goes deep in the crease and gently nudges the ball wide of midwicket
more flight from Ajmal, another "yourself" from Adnan as Masakadza drives off the front foot to cover
moves across and works the ball to midwicket, "Umar, Umar, Umar," Adnan says as Umar Akmal fields
another dive from Hafeez as he tries to stop an on-drive from Taylor, can't stop the single
that was a close call, big lbw shout, Masakadza misses a regulation offspinner, is struck in front of middle and leg, might have taken leg stump
the familiar single down to long-on
chopped towards point
pushed back towards the bowler
and once again long-on has to field as Taylor punches the ball all along the ground
Taylor defends the first ball off the front foot to the off side
watchfully gets behind the line and defends a length ball outside off
short of length and angling into off, tucked towards midwicket
a mild appeal for caught-behind, Masakadza come down the track to try whack the ball, off the thigh pad towards the keeper
gets some extra bounce there which surprises Masakadza, was on the back foot looking to cut but the ball soars over the edge
shuffles across the stumps and looks to whip the ball to midwicket, off the pad and Cheema has to run across to his right to field that
Masakadza goes for the reverse-sweep once more, again he doesn't connect well, off the gloves towards backward point
looks to cut hard off the back foot, no contact
short of length ball on off stump, Masakadza comes down the track and whips it towards midwicket
defended back towards the bowler
this time Hafeez does get across to his right to stop the ball, not a very well-timed shot from Taylor
worked to midwicket for a single, just two off the over
short and wide, slapped towards deep point for a single
short of length and on off stump, defended towards point for a single
slants it in towards middle, helped along with the angle towards fine leg
goes the pull, not very convincing from Masakadza though he gets four for it, it was a slower bouncer from Cheema, Masakadza helps it along fine for four
wanted to tuck that towards square leg, but can't connect and is struck on the pad outside off
short from Cheema and coming in to the batsman, who drags it towards midwicket
length ball on off stump, clipped to midwicket w here Umar prevents the single
once more Hafeez wins his battle to stop the ball from going to long-on, dives to his right to stop that drive
there's the half-century for Masakadza, he has had to graft his way in this innings, not been easy for him, he gets to the milestone by guiding the ball towards fine leg
firmly hit towards midwicket, not placed well enough to get the run
another Hafeez dive to his right to cut off a drive
starts this spell with a short ball, doesn't get hold of it, it lobs towards square leg but wide of all fielders
Masakadza has been beaten by the bounce plenty of times in this innings, Junaid bends his back and digs in a short of length ball that whizzes past Masakadza's top edge
on the pads, helped along towards deep backward square leg
length ball on middle, Taylor shows the full face as he defends it down the track
Taylor opens the face and wants to guide the ball with the angle towards third man, not timed at all, the ball dribbles towards the keeper, there's sufficient time to get a single
nice shot for no runs, backs away to make room and muscles it towards short cover, straight at the fielder
the 100 partnership comes up with a signature shot of this stand, a measured drive to long-on
punched off the front foot towards sweeper cover
how many times has Hafeez had to dive to his right in this spell? once again he nearly tangles with the non-striker as he stops the ball
worked behind square leg for a single
big shout for caught-behind, or lbw, it was off the pads so he's not caught and that was sliding down so it was not lbw
another lbw appeal, again it is going down
length ball on middle and off, Taylor gets behind the line and defends
shorter this time, and on the pads, glanced down to fine leg, Taylor wanted two from the outset, he raced through the first and came speeding back for the second which completes his half-century
length ball outside off, defended to the off side from the crease

short and wide ball, Taylor looks to uppercut that one, he gets hold of it well and it goes fine, but the third man has been placed fine for him, and is awaiting the catch, the Pakistan fans love it, a bunch of them running around with a Pakistan flag aloft
length ball heading for off, defended to short cover
short of length ball on legstump, tucked towards deep midwicket
defended towards short cover
beaten outside off as he looks to defend that one
looks to drive off the front foot, he misses and Adnan takes off the bails and appeals, third umpire confirms Taibu's back foot was grounded
the reverse-sweep hasn't worked for Zimbabwe today, this time Taibu fluffs the shot, the ball dribbles towards backward point
again the reverse-sweep, the ball rolls behind point
swept down to fine leg for a single
superb running from Taibu, he opens the face and guides the ball towards deep backward point, third man has to come across to his right, Taibu sprints back for the second
Taibu backs away from the stumps, it is a short ball over the stumps, Taibu lets it through to the keeper
short ball outside off, looks to uppercut that one but is beaten by the extra bounce
short of length ball on off stump, defended to the off side
on the pads this time, clipped towards midwicket, Taibu wanted two but Masakadza settles for one
shortish ball, Maskadza backs away and slaps that in the air towards deep extra cover
the sweep from Taibu, nicely placed, not too much power behind the shot, it goes all along the ground and the square leg umpire hops out of its way as it races for four
another sweep, this time towards deep backward square leg for a single
poked towards point for a single
goes for the reverse-sweep, off the toe end of the bat towards the bowler
phew, there's a doosra, Taibu has no clue about that one, beaten by a long way outside off
looks to end the over the way he started, with a sweep to square leg, but he can't connect and is struck on the body
full ball outside off, looks to drive and is beaten
length ball slanting in towards off, punched towards long-on
short of length and outside off, opens the face to steer the ball towards point
Taibu was was shaping for a scoop, Cheema fires it full and wide after seeing the batsman move, Taibu can't connect
punched towards cover by Taibu
Taibu giving this innings some impetus, he slices a length ball past point for four
comedy in Harare, another failed reverse-sweep from Masakadza, and he ends up head butting the ball, Ajmal laughs
doosra outside off, Masakadza doesn't read it, left alone
defended off the front foot towards cover
wonderful, the Ajmal doosra works its magic again, Masakadza hs been in the middle a long time but he has no clue about that one, through to the keeper
tucked behind square leg for a single
again Taibu ends the over with a boundary, he is terrific with the sweep shot, this time he gets the ball behind deep backward square leg for four

shot! a massive six from Masakadza, he has hard a tough time today, he plants his front foot forward and slams that over midwicket for a huge six, that has gone out of the ground I think, the fourth umpire has come out with a replacement ball

Cheema makes a vehement appeal for lbw, the usual delivery slanting in from Cheema, Masakadza is struck on the pads, it was heading down the leg side, the ball runs away towards backward point, Masakadza scrambles a leg bye, and loses his footing as he completes the run and tumbles over, it's all happening
clipped towards midwicket for a single

will wonders never cease? Misbah has pulled off a direct hit, and that's the end of Masakadza, it was an overpitched ball and just outside off, crunched towards extra cover, a tight single is attempted, Misbah fires it in on the bounce, and that hits the top of the stumps with Masakadza well short, third umpire not needed for this, the two batsmen nearly collided at the middle, that cost Masakadza plenty of time, he had to give way to Taibu, he didn't even bother trying to make his ground, just hoping that the throw was wide
Taibu drives that towards point and pinches a single
full ball on the pads, worked behind square leg for a single
looks to sweep after stepping across the stumps, off the arm and into the helmet, Ajmal hitting the helmet more often than a fast bowler
Waller gets off the strike, taps the ball towards backward point and Taibu to face now
Taibu guides the doosra to backward point and screams for a single, Waller responds early
towards short fine for a single

yet another reverse-sweep goes very wrong, Taibu was in position to play the shot very early, gets a top edge and that ball is in the air for a while, but somehow eludes all the men in the ring, lands halfway to backward point
end of a terrific over from Ajmal, defended to the leg side
slides it towards legstump, clipped towards square leg for a single
a legstump yorker and that is dug out towards mid-off for a single
full ball on the pads, whipped behind square leg, Aizaz keeping it very full here, batsmen can't get under it
there's a boundary the crowd had been screaming for, a crisp cover drive from Waller for four
slower ball, full and wide, Waller spots it early and he slices it just behind point for four more
short ball and the batsman ducks under it
just outside off, slapped towards point, can't beat the fielder
on middle stump this time, defended to the leg side

and is that another run-out? Mohammad Hafeez dives to his left at extra cover to stop a fierce drive from Taibu, the ball has rolled a few yards away from him, he collects it and throws it to the keeper, who had been hollering for the ball, the batsmen had initially wanted two before Waller was sent back, he diving in desperation but he can't make it, third umpire is called for but Waller knows he out
the doosra is too short, so the batsman has time to adjust his stroke, lashed towards sweeper cover, Sohail Tanvir has a lot of ground to cover
the conventional sweep continues to proves useful for Taibu, he gets this away towards deep backward square leg and gets a single
length ball outside off, defended back towards the bowler

Tanvir bowls from wide of the crease, Taibu was going for a powerful heave, he misses and the off stump is a few yards behind where it was originally, big blow for Zimbabwe, Taibu was the man they wanted for the home stretch
the bouncer to greet Utseya, it is too high and that's called a wide
bouncer is followed by a pinpoint yorker, Utseya gets his bat down in time, but can't get it away
a couple of superb bits of fielding from Pakistan has resulted in two run-outs, but this was a poor effort from Ajmal, he should have stopped that glide from Utseya, he lets it through for four
a mistimed drive towards mid-on for a single
in the blockhole, jabbed back towards the bowler, who gets a hand on it but can't stop it, batsmen steal a single
worked towards deep backward square leg for a single
the doosra results in a familiar awkward attempt to defend
another doosra, another dot ball, Chigumbura looks to crash that through the off but misses
the regulation offspinner, looks to work it to leg but misses
it's short this time and Chigumbura is onto it quickly, powerfully hit towards deep midwicket
tries the lap shot, can't time it and the ball rolls towards short fine
hello! what a shot that is, a rare length ball from Tanvir, gets his front leg out of the way and a piledriver is unleashes, sends the ball flat and over long-on, into the zimbabwean dressing room
yorker this time, driven towards long-off
innovative from Utseya, shuffles across the stumps and lap sweeps that full toss from outside off to fine leg for four

Tanvir foxes the batsman with a slower delivery, Utseya had no clue about that one, he was nearly through with the shot before the ball arrived, he wanted to smear that to midwicket, instead gets a top edge over the keeper's head
a full ball is hammered towards long-off, reaches the fielder on the bounce and Zimbabwe finish on 225

inn2.comm: starts with a slightly short ball, a mistimed pull towards midwicket
fuller and outside off, a bit of movement away, left alone
wider outside off, too wide for the umpire's liking
again outside off, but much closer to the stumps , Hafeez shoulders arms
driven towards extra cover, misfield by Chigumbura makes it an easy single
guided towards third man for a single to open his account
superb fielding from Sibanda at point, Hafeez struck that firmly but a diving Sibanda stops any thoughts of a run
encouraging first ball from Vitori, a length ball outside off that moves away
ooh, this one was much closer to off stump, Farhat looks to defend and is beaten
pitched up and outside off, played towards deep backward point
overpitched and outside off, Hafeez shoulders arms
getting the ball to shape in towards the right-hander, off the pad to the leg side
short of length and just outside off, left alone by Hafeez
down the leg side, the umpire thinks its brushed a pad, I thought that was a wide
short of length ball on legstump, tucked towards square leg by Farhat
slanting down the leg side, a play and a miss from Farhat, close to a wide that
pitched up and just outside off, Farhat gets forward and pushes it towards cover
this time it is called a wide, down the leg side for the third time in the over
back of a length, on middle and leg, defended towards mid-on
Vitori nearly has a breakthrough, a length ball angling across, Hafeez stretches forward to play that, inside-edged on to the pad, the ball dribbles towards the off and a quick single is taken
swings away from the left-hander, short of a length and around off, defended off the back foot
shorter this time and a bit of width, Hafeez goes for the width, mistimed it towards point
lovely delivery from Vitori, short of a length and moved away off the seam, Farhat is searching for it outside off stump, he's beaten
strays on to the pads, the ball dribbles to the right of the keeper
Vitori continues to make the ball swing, comes in to Hafeez, who checks his drive towards mid-off
punched just wide of extra cover to give the batsmen time to take a single
short of a length, terrific line from Mpofu, just outside off, Hafeez pegged on the back foot, defended down the track
a length ball on off stump, is firmly punched towards the bowler, who can't stop the ball as it bounces and reaches his at face height
clipped towards midwicket
full ball down the leg side, helped along to fine leg
length ball driven on the up towards backward point
swinging down the leg side, Hafeez clips it down towards fine leg where Waller makes a diving stop which the crowd appreciates
length ball outside off, square driven on the up, played in the air but well wide of the fielders and that's Pakistan's first boundary
slightly fuller this time from Vitori, Farhat defends it towards cover
short of a length and on off stump, defended from the crease to the off side
blocked towards point this time
punched off the front foot towards mid-off
length ball angling in, it ends up on the pads, Hafeez times it beautifully towards deep midwicket
on offstump this time, length ball is blocked back to the bowler
shortish ball, tight around off again, more defence from Farhat
just outside off, slapped towards point by Farhat but can't beat the fielder
steady over this from Mpofu, no room on offer, length ball around off, defended towards cover
this time it is full and wide, Farhat tries to squeeze it behind point but can't get bat on it
Hafeez is very good on the pull, it was a short ball from Vitori, Hafeez swivels as he muscles that for four
fuller and on the pads, Hafeez works it towards midwicket
angling down the leg side, Farhat tries to glance it and he misses, there's a big appeal for caught behind, but that missed everything
down the leg side again, clipped to square leg
short of a length delivery, defended towards cover
a touch short from Vitori, Hafeez hangs back and chops that hard towards deep backward point
the runs starting to flow for Pakistan, Farhat gets another square driven boundary, gets forward and plays it a little uppishly but wide of the fielder for four
much more emphatic from Farhat this time, short and wide from Mpofu, Farhat blasts that with a flat bat past point, powerfully hit
gets forward and guides this one to the left of third man
length ball outside off, tapped towards point by Hafeez
whipped towards square leg by Hafeez, straight at the fielder
full and outside off, driven towards point by Hafeez, a slower delivery that
slanting into the pads, mistimed push towards mid-on by Farhat
length ball on off stump, driven towards mid-off by Farhat
short of length ball on the pads, helped down to fine leg for a single
pitched up, on middle and off, driven towards mid-on
shortish and a bit of width, slashed towards point by Hafeez, a misfield gives away a single
better line from Vitori, on offstump, careful pushed to the left of the bowler
length ball on middle and off, defended towards mid-off
punched towards mid-on this time
supremely timed by Hafeez, an inside-out cover drive after getting a big stride in, against the turn as well, eases it between cover and extra cover for four
this time towards deep extra cover, some lazy fielding allows an extra run
length ball outside off, pushed towards point
full ball, and Hafeez does what was done to plenty of his deliveries earlier today, drives to long-on for a single
short of length and angling in, just outside off, defended towards the bowler
helped along to fine leg for an ambled single
shuffles across and clips the ball from middle and off towards deep square leg, there's a dive at square leg but the fielder can't stop it
Pakistan taking charge here, a crisp drive past mid-off for four from Hafeez, slightly overpitched and Hafeez capitalises

Hafeez survives, a short ball outside off, Hafeez launches into his favourite pull shot, top-edges and that's flies a long way up and towards Mpofu at fine leg, Mpofu has to come across some distance, he just about reached it but can't latch on to it, tough chance that
a firm drive towards point off the front foot
down the legside, Farhat looks to sweep and misses
eased along the ground towards long-off for a single
this time the right-hander drives to long-off for an easy single, Hafeez has 2000 ODI runs
this time Farhat connects as he tries to sweep, muscular hit in the air, flies to the square leg boundary
tipped towards midwicket, Farhat sets off for a run but the fielder closes in quickly, Farhat has to put the brakes on and turns back, the throw is wide though and Farhat dives in
tossed up on a length, defended to the off side
blocked to the leg side this time to end the over
angling in towards the pads, tucked towards square leg by Hafeez
short of length ball on offstump, defended towards point
short of length ball and outside off, carved through covers for a single
just outside off, poked towards point, there's a mix-up, Farhat was racing through for a single, Hafeez was ball watching, and Farhat has to turn back
punched off the front foot towards mid-off

not the best of Hafeez's shots, he wanted to go over cover, but gets it off the toe end of the bat, there's still enough on the shot to take it over the head of mid-off, another boundary for Pakistan who are cruising now
length ball on the off stump, punched to long-on for a single
wide outside off, Farhat opens the face and guides the ball towards short third man
tossed up, on a length and on legstump, defended towards midwicket
down the leg side, Farhat goes for the sweep and misses
outside off and that is defended watchfully
rocks back and drives that along the ground to long-on for a single
tucks the final ball of the Powerplay towards midwicket
starts with a length ball on offstump, defended towards mid-off
another length ball is pushed back towards the bowler
on the pads this time, helped along towards long-on for a single
fired in towards the stumps, defended towards the bowler
nudged towards square leg for a single
full ball and that is pushed towards cover
eased down to long-on for a single
into the pads, and that is driven towards long-on, few worries for Pakistan's batsmen here
short from Utseya, Hafeez tries to muscle it past cover, but a diving stop prevents any runs
another ambled single after pushing the ball to long-on
theres the first uncomfortable delivery in a while, Farhat beaten as he looks to defend off the front foot, the ball fizzes past the outside edge
quicker delivery on the pads, nudged to the leg side
down the leg side, off the pads and the keeper fields
flighted on middle, Hafeez pushes it to the leg side
defended down the track
flighted delivery, Hafeez looks to drive that after getting his front leg well outside leg, inside-edged towards fine leg
plants his front foot well forward and sweeps powerfully to square leg for four, nicely done by Hafeez
flicks it from offstump towards the leg side for another single
length ball spins in, cut against the turn towards deep point
driven towards long-on for another risk-free single
punched towards cover off the front foot, not much turn on offer for the Zimbabweans
and once again down the leg side, too far for the keeper to collect as well
spins in towards the batsman, who makes room and drives towards cover, a diving stop from Taylor
guides this one towards backward point, where Price dives to stop
a bit of width and that is chopped towards deep point for a single
defended towards cover
driven down towards long-off for a single
fired in towards middle, quicker delivery, defended to the bowler
length ball on the pads, Hafeez misses out on an opportunity, his sweep can't beat the short fine leg
tapped back towards the bowler
short ball and just outside off, Hafeez skips away from leg to make room to cut, he bottom-edges it towards point
starts with a short of length ball on the pads, tucked behind square leg by Farhat
gets well forward and guides a length ball towards backward point
shortish ball that doesn't get up as much as he wants, Hafeez pulls it away to deep midwicket
punched from the crease towards deep extra cover, "Two, two, two," calls Farhat as soon as he plays the shot
steps forward and slashes it towards sweeper cover
another short ball, another pull from Hafeez, a more controlled shot this, and that brings up the half-century for Hafeez and Pakistan sail to 97 for 0
a bit short and outside off, helped down to third man for a single
on-drive from Hafeez, and Price does what Hafeez did plenty of times in the afternoon, dives to his right to stop the ball from getting past
the forward press from Hafeez
length ball on middle stump, defended off the front foot towards cover
just outside off, Hafeez makes room and steers the ball down to fine leg to bring up Pakistan's 100
an inside-edge, but Hafeez survives, the ball rolls behind square leg
length ball slanting into off, defended towards mid-off off the front foot
slower ball from Chibhabha, down the leg side, helped along to fine leg
driven towards mid-on by Hafeez off the front foot
short of length ball just outside off, pushed towards cover
shortish ball and that is pulled towards deep midwicket by Hafeez
short of length ball is punched towards cover
on middle stump, short of a length, pushed back to the bowler
length ball, forward defence from Hafeez
streaky from Hafeez, gets him a boundary though, he backs away and tries to cut a ball from legstump, and one that is coming in as well, a thick edge results, and the ball flies past the keeper
slightly overpitched, careful forward defence
bowled from wide of the crease, stands tall and defends
on leg stump, punched towards long-on for another single
shortish and outside off, carved towards sweeper cover for one more
Farhat opens the face and steers the ball to third man, all too easy for Pakistan here
attempts the bouncer, that was very short and goes well over the batsman's head
short of length and outside off, an attempted slower ball, left alone by Hafeez
tapped behind point off the front foot
outside off, and once again Hafeez is happy to leave
shortish, Hafeez stands tall and guides it to third man for a single
overpitched on off stump, driven towards mid-off where Chigumbura misfields, and allows a run
length ball outside off, driven towards point
beaten, Vitori has bowled some beauties today, just jags away a touch after bouncing short of a length, some bounce there as well, Farhat is left flailing at it outside off
pitched up and around off stump, punched off the front foot towards point
fullish ball on off, Farhat throws his bat at it, a bit of an inside-edge as the ball rolls past mid-on
a more confident, controlled shot from Farhat, dabs it through covers
short of length ball, on legstump, tucked towards square leg
slips in the bouncer, Hafeez plays the pull, the square leg umpire scurries for cover, great reflexes from Gould  there to skip out of the way of that
length ball on middle and off, defended off the front foot towards cover
played with soft hands towards point, a quick single is attempted, Sibanda races in and tries to throw down the stumps, diving forward as he releases the ball, can't hit the stumps
a familiar shot, the punch to long-on for an ambled single
short ball is guided down to third man for a single
and once more Farhat steers it to third man for a single
short and a bit of width, guides it to third man for one more
length ball on off stump, driven towards mid-off
short of length ball, nice line around off, Farhat is cramped for room and defends it down the track
third man is kept busy as one more delivery is glided there, one more single
keeps a bit low outside off, poked towards cover for a single
overpitched and just outside off, driven towards mid-off
down the leg side, Farhat goes for the sweep, he can't get it past backward square leg
short of length ball, punched towards long-on for a single
length ball on middle and off, tapped back to the bowler
Hafeez goes for an expansive sweep, he misses and Taibu takes off the bails, back foot stays in the crease
the first reverse-sweep of the innings, guides towards a diving Price at short third
short ball just outside off, Hafeez plays the pull very well, controlled shot, down to deep square leg for two
another pull, this time there is more power behind the shot, the short ball sits up, muscled in front of point for four
pitched up this time, on middle and leg, defended towards midwicket
short of length and outside off, Hafeez dabs it towards third man for one more
way outside off
shortish ball on middle, defended towards point
short ball outside off, bottom edge to the off side
length ball on off stump, pushed towards cover
fifty for Farhat, whipped behind square leg for a single
length ball outside off, pushed towards long-off for a single
worked towards long-on for a single
into the pads this time, clipped towards midwicket
blocked towards point
helped along down to fine leg
short of length ball on off stump, opens the face to dab it to third man
short and wide ball, slapped towards point
forward defensive from Hafeez
full ball going down leg, off the pads towards square leg
down to third man for two more
tipped to the off side, and a quick single is taken though Taibu races out, fields, and chucks the ball towards the bowler
sweeps to short fine leg
short from Utseya, width as well, Farhat punishes that, slapping it behind point
flatter delivery, pushed towards cover
driven towards long-off for a single
single to long-on this time
flight from Price, punched back toward the bowler
Price has troubled Hafeez today several times, again he gets the top edge  as Hafeez backs away and tries to cut, again it's the top edge past the keeper
Farhat slaps the ball towards point and gets a single
on the legstump, clipped towards midwicket
length ball on offstump, driven towards mid-off
on legstump, tapped behind square leg for one more
short and wide, guided down to third man for a single
opens the face and steers to third man once again
pushed towards mid-off
short of length and outside off, Hafeez opens the face and gives the third man fielder some more work
Farhat looks to blast that over mid-off, a length ball angling across, he doesn't connect
pushed towards cover to end the over
full ball on offstump, defended towards cover
on legstump this time, clipped to square leg
low full toss just outside off, driven towards long-off
swept behind square leg
nearly a run-out, poked towards point, Hafeez starts running for the single, turns back and rushes, a direct hit would have had him, there isn't one and Hafeez gratefully dives back in
worked to backward square leg for a single
slants it into the pads, clipped to square leg for two  more
pushed off the back foot to mid-off
short of length and heading for off, punched off the back foot towards mid-on
length ball, defended to the off side by Hafeez
the Hafeez pull is shown off again, towards deep midwicket for a single
guided down to third man for a single
swept down towards fine leg by Farhat, Mpofu does well to get round that one
length ball on off stump, pushed back towards the bowler
on the pads, defended to the leg side
what a way to get to your 100, a slog sweep for six, powered in front of square leg and into the crowd, Hafeez reaches career century No. 3
on middle stump, tucked to midwicket for a quick single, another misfield makes it easy for the batsmen
driven towards mid-on, another fumble but Hafeez decides against the single
slower ball, length and on off, pushed towards mid-off off the front foot
shortish and outside off, Hafeez pulls one from outside off, muscled way on front of square leg
a bouncer from Mpofu, too high that one, called a wide
overpitched on the pads, whipped towards deep backward square leg, Waller races across to his right to cut off what seemed to be a boundary
a near yorker from Mpofu, just outside off, that one comes in towards the batsman, defended towards cover
taps the ball towards mid-on for a single
short of length ball outside off, Farhat opens the face to try guide the ball to third man, he is beaten
full wide delivery, Hafeez steers that down to third man for four, just opens the face, no intention of powering the ball, very well done by Hafeez

Hafeez wants to finish it in a hurry, that seemed headed for the cover boundary but Masakadza has chased it down, it was a length ball that Hafeez played over covers, couldn't get enough power to make it reach the rope
looks to swing that one towards midwicket, off the pads and behind point for a leg bye, Vitori appeals for lbw, but that was going down
short and well outside off, dabbed wide of third man by Hafeez
Hafeez having a bit of fun here, stretches forward and times that through cover for four, that brings up the highest score of his career, and what a stylish shot to do it with

toying with Zimbabwe now, the third man had just come into the circle, Hafeez sees that and bunts the ball just over the head of short third man for four more, and this now is Pakistan's highest opening stand in ODIs
chopped towards point for a single
length ball sliding into the pads, glanced past short fine for four, Pakistan galloping towards victory now
a yorker length ball on middle, Hafeez digs it out and manages to send it towards short fine
shortish and just outside off, Hafeez opens the face to dab it to short third
once more he tries to get it past short third, takes the single this time
overpitched by Mpofu and that is squeezed out to the backward point boundary, another expensive over this
eased towards long-on for a single
down the leg side, looks to sweep, gets it down towards short fine leg
played with soft hands wide of mid-on, and the batsmen scramble two
a full ball is punched down towards long-off
length ball is pushed towards mid-off for a single
chopped towards deep point for a couple, Pakistan two away now
nope, just a four, it's a trademark Hafeez pull behind square leg for the boundary that seals the series for Pakistan, they are 2-0 up now
